body.content:
Attention  Gertrude


Dear Sir/Ma ,
Thanks for your response as regards the  Loan Facility / Bank Guarantee ,
First , let me use this opportunity to fully introduce myself  we are
financial Brokers/Consultant  and we work on *commission base's* as we
bridge up the gap between* Lender and the Borrower *thereby Facilitating
and making Funds available to Investors for easy Investment through
provision of Bank Guarantee for  Loan Application .

      * Please Note that our Loan facility / Bank Guarantee are :- *

 (1) It is an unconventional loan that is easy to access and obtain .
 (2) It has Flexible terms , Low interest rate and Tenure  Etc .
 (3) It is Less ambiguous in the closing process .
 (4) The Source is very legitimate and the Transaction is Real .

  Please note that we do not operate a website or need it to persuade our
clients, Our clients are strictly on confidential referral or directly
sourced by us in most cases , therefore I will advise you to provide me
with the following Information to enable us process and recommend  you to
the Financier .




* (A) Letter of Intent (LOI) . (B) Executive summary for the purpose of the
Loan . (c) Cash flow analysis for the loan duration . (D) Tenure .*

The Concept/Letter of Intent should specify also  Contact information
including the *Names of the Applicant ,  Company's Name & Address (If Any )
, Phone Numbers,  and working Email Address* with this Information at our
disposal we will now use our influence to make Recommendation and speed up
the Approval process by Introducing you to the Financier/Lender .
I await your urgent response

Thanks

*Larry Lawrence +44 745 2394 020*

*N-B*
For Security & Confidential Reasons do ensure that henceforth all further
correspondence be directed to this New Email Address as the previous one is
open to my entire Office Staffs .
